examples.korean: the blood and iron policy of the Iron Chancellor 발음듣기 철재상<鐵宰相>(비스마르크)의 피와 철(鐵)의 정책. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: the blood and iron policy of the Iron Chancellor 발음

examples.korean: And so they're kind of embedded in this mesh or this sea of electrons. 발음듣기 그래서 鐵의 原子는 電子의 그물 또는 전자의 바다에 파묻히게 됩니다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. proudgray(prou****) Khan Academy
examples.english: And so they're kind of embedded in this mesh or this sea of electrons. 발음

examples.korean: Now what's interesting about the Hittites is that they were one of the first to start to use iron. 발음듣기 그런데 히타이트사람이 흥미로운 사실은 그들이 처음으로 鐵(철)을 사용한 사람들 중의 하나라는 점입니다. Khan Academy
examples.english: Now what's interesting about the Hittites is that they were one of the first to start to use iron. 발음

examples.korean: But one thing that Bantu-speaking cultures had in common was that they knew how to make and use iron tools and weapons. 발음듣기 하지만 반투어를 쓰는 문화의 공통점 가운데 하나는 鐵(철) 연장과 철 무기를 만들어 쓸 줄 알았다는 사실입니다. Khan Academy
examples.english: But one thing that Bantu-speaking cultures had in common was that they knew how to make and use iron tools and weapons. 발음
